channel.title: Project Insanity - Lighting Up Teleports
channel.description:
I do not know if this is server sided or client sided sorry.
How would I make it so my teleports always appear lit-up (like if I had enough runes to cast the spell).First picture is what mine looks like and the 2nd picture is what I want it to look like. By the way, I want this for ANCIENTS, NORMAL, and LUNAR.
[img]http://screensnapr.com/u/5k7lm2.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/u/jni8y9.png[/img]
